name: Catch The Balls
description:
Test your brain and improve your reflex via "Impossible Rush - Square" Game.

Spin the color wheel and catch the maximum number of colored balls.

A simple and addictive game to entertain in those moments of boredom.

5 different levels of play.

  • A square with 4 colors.
  • A hexagon with 6 colors.
  • A mix square and hexagon.

More levels coming soon!

Features:

  • Suitable for tablet and phone
  • Thoughtful Design
  • Simple to Adjust
  • Easy to Play ;)
  • Hard to Master

More Features coming soon!.
